thread.title: Paul Ryan: Flynn's resignation was the 'right decision'
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan: Flynn's resignation was the 'right decision'

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Paul Ryan: Flynn's resignation was the 'right decision'
text:
Paul Ryan said Tuesday that Michael Flynn's resignation was the "right decision," without giving more details about what the White House knew about the former national security advisor's dealings with Russia before he stepped down. 
"I think the president made the right decision to ask for his resignation," the Republican House speaker told reporters. 
"As soon as they realized they were being misled by the national security advisor, they asked for his resignation." 
In Flynn's resignation letter circulated by the White House on Monday night, he did not explicitly say that Trump asked for him to step down.
